languages.text: {n}Скоморох насмешливо вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "И каким же, позволь узнать, образом? Как проводится ритуал — знаем только я и Тавриск. А уж провести его может и подавно только он. А мы, так уж вышло, не очень хотим с тобой сотрудничать".

traits.locale_text: @@@{n}Скоморох насмешливо вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "И каким же, позволь узнать, образом? Как проводится ритуал — знаем только я и Тавриск. А уж провести его может и подавно только он. А мы, так уж вышло, не очень хотим с тобой сотрудничать".
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor

languages.text: {n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."
languages.original_text: {n}Скоморох насмешливо вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "И каким же, позволь узнать, образом? Как проводится ритуал — знаем только я и Тавриск. А уж провести его может и подавно только он. А мы, так уж вышло, не очень хотим с тобой сотрудничать".

traits.locale_text: {n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

{n}The jester mockingly sticks out his chin, caressing the cage with your body.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only I and Tavrisk know how the ritual works. And certainly he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens we have little desire to cooperate."

{n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

{n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin, caressing the cage containing your body.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

{n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

{n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

{n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

languages.text: {n}小丑嘲弄般地扬着下巴。{/n}“那请问，你打算怎么做呢？只有我和塔夫瑞克才知道这个仪式如何运作。没错，他是唯一一个能举行仪式的人，而遗憾的是，我们刚巧不怎么打算合作。”
languages.original_text: {n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}小丑嘲弄般地扬着下巴。{/n}“那请问，你打算怎么做呢？只有我和塔夫瑞克才知道这个仪式如何运作。没错，他是唯一一个能举行仪式的人，而遗憾的是，我们刚巧不怎么打算合作。”

languages.text: {n}道化は嘲るように顎をしゃくる。{/n}「それで、どうやってそれを実行するつもりか、聞かせてもらおうか？儀式の仕組みを知っているのは、タヴリスクと私だけだ。そして実際に儀式を行えるのは、彼しかいない。あいにく、私たちには協力する気などこれっぽっちもないがね」
languages.original_text: {n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}道化は嘲るように顎をしゃくり、あなたの身体が入っている檻を愛おしげに撫でてみせた。{/n}「それで、どうやってそれを実行するつもりか、聞かせてもらおうか？儀式の仕組みを知っているのは、タヴリスクと私だけだ。そして実際に儀式を行えるのは、彼しかいない。あいにく、私たちには協力する気などこれっぽっちもないがね」

languages.text: {n}El bufón levanta la barbilla con aire burlón.{/n} «¿Y cómo pretende hacer eso, quisiera yo saber? Tavrisk y yo somos los únicos que conocemos el ritual; de hecho, nadie más que él puede llevarlo a cabo. Y el caso es que no nos sentimos muy cooperativos».
languages.original_text: {n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}El bufón levanta la barbilla con aire burlón.{/n} «¿Y cómo pretende hacer eso, quisiera yo saber? Tavrisk y yo somos los únicos que conocemos el ritual; de hecho, nadie más que él puede llevarlo a cabo. Y el caso es que no nos sentimos muy cooperativos».

languages.text: {n}Soytarı, alayla çenesini uzatıyor.{/n} "Merak ettim, bunu nasıl yapacaksın acaba? Ayini bir tek Tavrisk'le ben biliyoruz. Gerçekleştirebilecek tek kişi de o zaten. İşin tuhafı, iş birliği yapasımız yok."
languages.original_text: {n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soytarı, alayla çenesini uzatıyor.{/n} "Merak ettim, bunu nasıl yapacaksın acaba? Ayini bir tek Tavrisk'le ben biliyoruz. Gerçekleştirebilecek tek kişi de o zaten. İşin tuhafı, iş birliği yapasımız yok."

languages.text: {n}Le bouffon vous adresse un coup de menton moqueur.{/n} « Et comment comptez-vous y parvenir, si ce n'est pas indiscret ? Seul Tavrisk et moi connaissons les secrets du rituel que lui seul peut l'accomplir. Et il se trouve que nous ne sommes guère enclins à coopérer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le bouffon vous adresse un coup de menton moqueur.{/n} « Et comment comptez-vous y parvenir, si ce n'est pas indiscret ? Seul Tavrisk et moi connaissons les secrets du rituel que lui seul peut l'accomplir. Et il se trouve que nous ne sommes guère enclins à coopérer. »

languages.text: {n}Der Hofnarr reckt spöttisch sein Kinn hervor.{/n} "Und wie, wenn ich fragen darf, wollt Ihr das anstellen? Nur Tavrisk und meine Wenigkeit wissen, wie das Ritual funktioniert. Zudem ist er der Einzige, der es ausführen kann. Und wie es der Zufall will, haben wir nicht vor, mit Euch zu kooperieren."
languages.original_text: {n}The fool mockingly sticks out his chin.{/n} "And how, may I ask, do you intend to do that? Only Tavrisk and myself know how the ritual works; certainly, he is the only one who can perform it. And it just so happens that we don't feel much inclined to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Hofnarr reckt spöttisch sein Kinn hervor.{/n} "Und wie, wenn ich fragen darf, wollt Ihr das anstellen? Nur Tavrisk und meine Wenigkeit wissen, wie das Ritual funktioniert. Zudem ist er der Einzige, der es ausführen kann. Und wie es der Zufall will, haben wir nicht vor, mit Euch zu kooperieren."
